About.ages_explanation: Years fo expertice in the IT consulting environment.
About.about_me: After plenty of years of experience in the IT consulting environment I have excelled in project management. If there is any chance to grow in this aspect I am open to listen to proposals.
About.projects_text: You can know more by downloading my CV .
AboutMe.description: Starting my career from the development field I ended up orienting myself to project and team management. Leaving development for personal and research projects.
AboutMe.description2: Regarding project management I have worked on software development, infrastructure and IT consulting projects. Always with the premise of continuous improvement and customer satisfaction.

Contact.Slot4_info: Due to the high volume of messages I receive, I reserve my personal information until first contact on linkedin chat. Thank you for your understanding.
